name: Nekoferi - Daily life with a catgirl
name_original: Nekoferi - Daily life with a catgirl
description:
0.10 - Game Loop UI/Interaction - testing

Please leave feedback on the visuals/UI/Interaction for the meantime

Tab - Open/Close Stats

Escape - Close Item shop/Gifting

Left click(drag) - Drag cat around to furniture for interacting things

Right click - Open interaction window
